function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding of essential supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of the virus through large-scale events and religious gatherings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community transmission in workplaces and public venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influx of chinese tourists during chinese new year","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confirmed cases of coronavirus in singapore","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying of surgical masks and medical supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic spread across the world","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on service industry, including travel and tourism","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in grocery retail operations due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with pandemic behaviors in certain market segments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential opposition between service organizations and non-compliant market segments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lessons learned from the covid-19 pandemic may not be effectively applied to future crises","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of common slogans and messages during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promoting the idea of solidarity and collective action","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to collective action in the citizenry","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collected from convenience sample of students may not be representative of broader population, limiting generalizability of study results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sample size of 124 observations may not be sufficient for conducting cross-validation analysis to ascertain the stability of the cluster structure.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited scope of data collection within the u.s. and lack of data from other countries may limit the robustness of the three-cluster solution.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of incorporation of individual difference variables, such as uncertainty avoidance and information avoidance tendency, in the eppm.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Consumers’ concrete thinking leading to short-term focus on individual discomfort and impact of guidelines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survivalists’ hyper-focus on hoarding products in the short term.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rejectionists viewing the pandemic as a hoax due to pre-conceived notions about the government or media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of marketers on how survivalists and rejectionists perceive information about the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different message strategies aimed at promotion-vs. prevention-focused consumers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consumers respond differently to pandemics, leading to the need for segmented marketing strategies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different motivations underlie consumer responses to the pandemic, leading to ineffective communication strategies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Marketers not monitoring consumer attitudes, emotions, and usage trends in real time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying among survivalist consumers due to product shortages and stockouts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in engaging rejectionist consumers due to defensive avoidance route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Firms avoid acknowledging the existence of the coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate protections for employees","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased inventory levels due to anticipated higher demand for rejectionist customers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survivalist consumers panic buying due to anxiety about limited service appointments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rejectionist consumers not acknowledging the existence of the coronavirus, leading to non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying among survivalists","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying behavior due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different consumer segments with varying responses to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divergent perceptions of coronavirus threat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Irrational responses and behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demographic influence on irrational responses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliability of multi-item scales","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cluster analysis based on perceived threat, susceptibility, fear, and attitude","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labeling of consumer segments rationals, maladaptive consumers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived health threat of coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived susceptibility of contracting coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear towards the coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Convenience sampling of undergraduate and mba students may not be representative of the general population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of political ideology on consumer perceptions and behaviors related to the coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coronavirus pandemic context may influence responses and behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consumer engagement in maladaptive behaviors in response to the coronavirus pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
